title: 86/129/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 March 1986 adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 March 1986
adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in France
(Only the French text is authentic)
(86/129/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from the Winter feeding period 1985/86, the list of less-favoured areas in France contained in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1985
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1985, p. 33.
(4) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1985, p. 46.
ANEXO - BILAG - ANHANG - PARARTIMA - ANNEX - ANNEXE - ALLEGATO - BIJLAGE - ANEXO
